channel.title: WiiU
channel.description:
[url=http://www.ny1.com/content/ny1_living/technology/140598/e3-2011--nintendo-unveils-the--wiiu-]http://www.ny1.com/content/ny1_living/technology/140598/e3-2011--nintendo-unveils-the--wiiu-[/url]
Hopefully there isn't already a topic for this, but discuss. The Wii has never been that great (some games are really fun though), but this has potential to be more fun. The only thing I'm concerned about is the price, and if games will specifically require having one of these things.

item.title: WiiU
item.dc:creator: @patargangstar patargangstar
item.description:
@patargangstar wrote:

Slave Scyth:

No “hardcore gamer” will ever play on a system with a name like “Wii”, no matter what the system entails. It’s as gay-sounding as soccer is looking.

agreed on that got a wii and it got boring in a month if even -.- goldeneye is fun though

Read full topic

No “hardcore gamer” will ever play on a system with a name like “Wii”, no matter what the system entails. It’s as gay-sounding as soccer is looking.
[/quote]
Soccer is the number 1 sport in the world. And the most athletic.

Try running back and forth a soccer field for an hour as fast as you can.[/quote]Ever seen a gay person? Many of them are pretty damn fit. Soccer’s still gay.

item.title: WiiU
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Marc has a point, the fact the Wii was made for something more of a family type console. Then I would assume that a lot of sales were decreasing and in time, game makers started to create games that failed such as COD for the console.

In this, it might seem that their trying their best to show the world their console can be better than the Xbox and PlayStation. Nonetheless, the Wii itself has become boring and the graphics are miserable to the eyes. I presume the price of this will be a little high because their going to try to gamble themselves, and hope that a lot of Wii users as well Xbox and PS users will switch to the Wii, so we’ll see.

Read full topic
